column1: * Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-Apr-2023 to 28-Mar-2024
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-Apr-2023 to 28-Mar-2024
* Impact Cost for Nifty Next 50 is for a portfolio of Rs. 25 Lakhs
* Impact Cost for Nifty Next 50 is the weightage average impact cost
